name: Psychedelic Mandala:  Multicolour void
description: A Mandala is one's imaginary palace for contemplating the universe. Each object represents an aspect of wisdom or a principle.  Slow the mind, watch it turn, disappear then return. This Mandala is an ultra high speed rotation of juicy colours. The void is so pink and yellow and baby blue! The artwork is part of a series that is intended to explore what is possible when constrained to extremely simple shapes and colours. Can they lead to transcendence? 1 minted for each day of May 2021
